title: A feasible approach for azo-dye (methyl orange) degradation by textile effluent isolate Serratia marcescens ED1 strain for water sustainability: AST identification, degradation optimization and pathway hypothesis
content:
Publication date: 15 June 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 11
